environment.name: PATH
environment.value: C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Common7\IDE;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Vc\vcpackages;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Vc\bin;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\vcpackages;C:\ACE\VC8\ACE_wrappers\bin;C:\ACE\VC8\ACE_wrappers\lib;c:\Cygwin\bin

environment.name: INCLUDE
environment.value: c:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\ATLMFC\INCLUDE;c:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\INCLUDE;c:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\PlatformSDK\include;c:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\SDK\v2.0\include;

environment.name: LIB
environment.value: c:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\ATLMFC\LIB;c:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\LIB;c:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\PlatformSDK\lib;c:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\SDK\v2.0\lib;LIBPATH=c:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v2.0.50727;c:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\ATLMFC\LIB

command.name: file_manipulation
command.options:
type=create file=ACE_wrappers/ace/config.h output='#define ACE_HAS_IPV6
#define ACE_DISABLE_WIN32_ERROR_WINDOWS
#define ACE_HAS_STANDARD_CPP_LIBRARY 1
#include \x22ace/config-win32.h\x22
'
